price: Ese ntibyababera ikimenyetso (kigaragaza ko Qur’an ari ukuri) kuba abamenyi b’Abayisiraheli barayimenye (nk’iy’ukuri, ndetse bamwe muri bo bakayoboka Isilamu)?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَكُن لَّهُمۡ ءَايَةً أَن يَعۡلَمَهُۥ عُلَمَٰٓؤُاْ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: awalam yakun lahum āyatan an yaʿlamahu ʿulamāu banī is'rāīla
